remarks: Multiple distributive law for scalar product (left-distributivity). (Contributed by AV, 5-Sep-2019.)
statement:
lmodvsmdi.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lmodvsmdi.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lmodvsmdi.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lmodvsmdi.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
lmodvsmdi.p $e |- .^ = ( .g ` W ) $.
lmodvsmdi.e $e |- E = ( .g ` F ) $.
lmodvsmdi $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ ( R e. K /\ N e. NN0 /\ X e. V ) ) -> ( R .x. ( N .^ X ) ) = ( ( N E R ) .x. X ) ) $.
